p: In the C. cassia extract, a total of 14 compounds representing 97.39% of the total extract were identified. The major constituent of this extract was ( E)-cinnamaldehyde (50.79%). The percentage compositions of the remaining 13 compounds ranged from 0.97 to 15.83% (Table 1). In C. cassia essential oil, 16 compounds were identified, accounting for 97.11% of the total composition. Specifically, the major constituent was ( E)-cinnamaldehyde (89.95%). The percentage abundance of the remaining 15 compounds ranged from 0.13 to 1.68% (Table 1).
